definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: At Kajaki the Royal Marines are training local army recruits .
sentences.chinese: 英国皇家海军陆战队正在卡加克训练当地的新兵。

sentences.english: The US presence is just a recruiting poster for the Taliban.
sentences.chinese: 美国的存在也就不过是张塔利班招募新兵的海报罢了。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the status of health literary about recruits.
sentences.chinese: 目的掌握入伍新兵健康素养情况。

sentences.english: The drill sergeant begins by putting the fear of God up every new recruit .
sentences.chinese: 这个教练军士一开始就给全体新兵一个下马威。

sentences.english: Safe havens have also afforded the militants endless opportunities to find new recruits.
sentences.chinese: 安全庇护所也为武装分子提供无限的机会去招募新兵。

sentences.english: Kay power will enjoy cadets back to barracks.
sentences.chinese: 凯权将玩的尽兴的新兵们带回军营。

sentences.english: An H1N1 virus jumps from pigs to humans and kills a US army recruit.
sentences.chinese: 一种从猪跳跃到人的H1N1病毒杀死一名美军新兵。

sentences.english: Chen Fei participated in the Niubi exhibition in 2008, and this year he will be showcasing his latest sculptures.
sentences.chinese: 陈飞于二零零八年参加第一回新兵展览。

sentences.english: The new recruits are not used to the rigid disciplines of the army.
sentences.chinese: 新兵不习惯于军队的严格纪律。

sentences.english: Good girls, Emily this beautiful woman, after a shared level of available recruits★
sentences.chinese: 良家妇女，卿本佳人，经过分享★新兵级别可浏览★。

sentences.english: New recruits are often broken in by repeated drilling on the square.
sentences.chinese: 新兵往往通过操练场的反复操练而逐渐适应。

sentences.english: The recruit made the current circulate in the circuit on the circumference.
sentences.chinese: 新兵使电流在周长上在电路内循环。

sentences.english: After the game Wenger paid tribute to the 23-year-old debutant.
sentences.chinese: 赛后，温格对这名23岁的新兵难抑赞美之辞。

sentences.english: The new soldiers were roll-called in front of their barracks.
sentences.chinese: 新兵在他们的营房前接受点名。

sentences.english: Oh, how was the recruit Daniel?
sentences.chinese: 哦，丹尼尔，招募新兵如何？

sentences.english: We should check whether there is any questions about recruitment.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该检查对征募新兵是否有疑问。

definition: warrant officer/petty officer/noncommissioned officer (NCO)/Japanese military officer
